channel.title: data download on Example YinYong Blog

item.title: 使用R下载SRA数据
item.description: library(SRAdb) setwd("/home/wqh/sra_download/SRR6660814") sra_dbname <- "../SRAmetadb.sqlite" sra_con <- dbConnect(dbDriver("SQLite"), sra_dbname) # For Failed to open TCP Connection # iptables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport 33001 -j ACCEPT # iptables -I OUTPUT -p tcp --dport 33001 -j ACCEPT ## Download sra files from NCBI SRA using ftp protocol: getSRAfile( c("SRR6660815"), sra_con, fileType='fastq') ## Download fastq files from EBI ftp siteusing fasp protocol: ascpCMD <- '/home/wqh/.aspera/connect/bin/ascp -QT -l 300m -P 33001 -i /home/wqh/.
